feed.title: Tracktor Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Tracktor: Initial Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Merge to main by @javedh-dev in https://github.com/javedh-dev/tracktor/pull/1
  • Release readiness by @javedh-dev in https://github.com/javedh-dev/tracktor/pull/2

  • 19 : Fixed keyboard switching issue on mobile devices by @javedh-dev in https://github.com/javedh-dev/tracktor/pull/26

  • style: Enhance text color consistency in components by @javedh-dev in https://github.com/javedh-dev/tracktor/pull/27
  • docs: Add screenshots to README and introduction for better visualization by @javedh-dev in https://github.com/javedh-dev/tracktor/pull/28

New Contributors

  • @javedh-dev made their first contribution in https://github.com/javedh-dev/tracktor/pull/1

Full Changelog: https://github.com/javedh-dev/tracktor/commits/v0.0.1

entry.title: New release for Tracktor: UI Revamp
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Refactored UI and added configurable units. by @javedh-dev in https://github.com/javedh-dev/tracktor/pull/34

Full Changelog: https://github.com/javedh-dev/tracktor/compare/0.0.1...0.0.2
